Using Sight Alone

Try using sight alone again to decide a patient’s race.

 

Look at these images and click those you think are Asian.

 

Click the "Submit" button when you are ready.                                          

This patient was born and raised in Mexico City and would not self- report being Asian if asked.

This patient was born in Ecuador. If asked, her parents would identify her as White.

This patient is Black and Filipino. If asked, he would self-report being Asian.

This patient is Black and German. If asked she would self-report as Black.
